FlavorTextOption.Text: There is something wrong here... something which makes my sheath retract and my talons ooze. I sense the ugliness of a thousand evil thoughts and I have located the source of these fetid emanations. They come from aboard one of your vessels! Foolish {LEADERNAME:2}, why have you come here? All that you have found is your inevitable punishment.

We sense... something... something ancient... a sickly smell... a chilling wind. My ancestors scream from within their chambers in my mind. But, I cannot understand their words. This feeling... a memory? It sickens us. We are the Ur-Quan Kohr-Ah. Your presence here is premature. Our nature, the fulfillment of our fate requires your destruction.
Vuresef, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Tipot {PLAYERFACTION:1}'s orisih beha rinin holares. Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! (You need to research Universal Translator)
Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. May the universe be large enough for both of us.
Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. If you share our values we will be loyal friends, if not...
Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Choose solar systems to explore, choose how to colonize new worlds, and choose your allies most carefully of all.
Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Will you fill your worlds with advanced labs or industrial factories? Either is fine with us, as long as you leave them undefended.
